resources.string: For this app to work properly, it must be excluded from Android\'s battery optimizations. Please add MyPowerSpy to the exemption list.
This mode must access your location. Please enable the phone\'s location services and restart the recording.

"For this app to work, it must access your location. Please grant the corresponding permission when launching MyPowerSpy the next time. In case Android stops asking for permission, change the apps permissions in the phone's system settings."
